labMembers.name: Prof. Fernando Diaz
labMembers.bio: Professor at Carnegie Mellon University, leading research in LLM evaluation, RAG systems, and AI ethics. Focus on developing fair and ethical AI systems.

labMembers.name: Sarah Chen
labMembers.bio: Researching fairness and bias in large language models. Developing novel evaluation frameworks for assessing model performance across diverse populations.

labMembers.name: Michael Park
labMembers.bio: Working on retrieval-augmented generation systems with a focus on improving context relevance and factual accuracy.
